mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study (title, content, keywords, imageUrl, created_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{keywords}, #{imageUrl}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, keywords, imageUrl, created_at FROM study ORDER BY created_at DESC
